__TOC__

How to use Compiz on Feisty:

* Install the relevant packages:
<pre>
sudo apt-get install desktop-effects compiz compiz-gnome gnome-session metacity
</pre>
* Go to System/Preferences/Desktop Effects. Click the button to enable the effects.
  (there is no System/Preferences on '''K'''ubuntu)

Nvidia users:

You'll need a 9000 series driver. Enable the restricted repositories and install the driver's package:
<pre>
sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx
</pre>

reconfigure the Xorg server to use the "nvidia" driver and the preferred display resolution:
<pre>
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
</pre>

and set

Option       "AddARGBGLXVisuals" "True"

in the screen section of your xorg.conf.
